metadata.title: CVE-2024-50211 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:udf: refactor inode_bmap() to handle errorRefactor inode_bmap() to handle error since udf_next_aext() can returnerror now. On situations like ftruncate, udf_extend_file() can nowdetect errors and bail out early without resorting to checking forparticular offsets and assuming internal behavior of these functions.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
